prompts: Create a robust steel-type Pokemon with a serpentine body covered in shiny metallic scales.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a giant snake made of steel, featuring sharp spikes along its spine.
Generate a fierce-looking steel-type Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a unique battle cry.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both steel and rock types, with a rugged appearance and powerful jaws.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends a snake's elegance with the toughness of metal, capable of coiling around enemies.
Design a Pokemon that is a massive serpent, adorned with crystal-like accents and a fearsome demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon with a striking blue color and jagged edges, known for its intimidating presence.
